short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A helper for accessing Jira tickets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This allows users to quickly access jira tickets that they know the ID of, without having to search for it within jira.

1 - Add your Jira Base url
2 - type 'otto' in the url bar, then the ticket number.
